item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/02/01/php-helpers-html_print_r/#comment-3181">Travis Ballard</a>.
Thanks. That's a smaller version, but my intent wasn't to make it super small, just super useful :-)
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Travis Ballard
item.dc:creator: Travis Ballard
item.content:encoded:
my comment on the html_var_dump would probably be more appropriate here.

printf(‘(pre)%s(/pre)’, print_r( $var, 1 ) );

replace the () tags with lt/gt
